title: Defeat Diabetes
description:
Join Australia’s leading evidence-based, doctor-led program that’s helped thousands of people lose weight effortlessly and send their type 2 diabetes into remission. 

Created by Dr Peter Brukner OAM with a team of doctors and dietitians, the Defeat Diabetes Program can help you manage your blood glucose levels, achieve weight loss and send pre-diabetes and type 2 diabetes into remission. 

Using the latest scientific evidence, the program shows you how to adapt your diet to your condition and radically transform your health.

The Defeat Diabetes Program can help:

✅ Send type 2 diabetes into remission
✅ Achieve weight loss
✅ Reduce medications
✅ Improve blood glucose
✅ Increase energy
✅ Improve sleep

After just three months on the Defeat Diabetes Program, members who responded to a survey have achieved impressive results: 

➤ 84% saw significant improvements in their blood glucose levels
➤ 52% were able to send type 2 diabetes into remission
➤ 78% reported weight loss with an average loss of 6kgs
➤ 76% reduced their waistline, losing on average 7.3cm
➤ 30% were able to reduce or stop taking medication
➤ 44% who took metformin could reduce or discontinue its use.

What you’ll get with this app:
➤ Free 14-day no-risk trial
➤ Access to the Program through both the mobile app and the online version of the program
➤ Practical, self-paced tutorials from doctors and dietitians
➤ Video masterclasses that deep dive into important topics
➤ Simple, affordable and delicious recipes 
➤ Customisable dietitian-approved menu plans - take the panic out of meal planning 
➤ Free exclusive online live events with world-leading experts
➤ Weekly newsletters and alerts
➤ A members-only Defeat Diabetes community group offering support, live events and exclusive competitions
➤ New videos, articles and meal plans added every week 

What our members say:
"Defeat Diabetes has changed my life and given me hope again. I'm so happy with the support I am receiving and feel like I have a team around me." - Tina, SA

"Since going low carb, my HbA1c has dropped, I can eat what I love and just watch my carbs. I’ve lost weight, I’m less tired, and my self-confidence is massive." - Greg, VIC

Invest in your health: 
You can subscribe to the Defeat Diabetes Program for three or 12 months. But at less than the price of a cup of coffee per week, our annual membership offers you the best value.
 
12 months: $10.75 p/m - 14 days free, then billed annually at $129.00
3 months: $19.67 p/m - 14 days free, then billed quarterly at $59.00 

Medical Disclaimer:
Consult a physician before making significant changes to your diet, especially if you have pre-existing health conditions. Nothing contained within the Defeat Diabetes application should be considered medical advice or diagnosis. Your use of the app and program is entirely at your own risk.

By purchasing a membership, you accept the following:
Defeat Diabetes Privacy Policy - https://www.defeatdiabetes.com.au/privacy-policy/
Defeat Diabetes Terms and Conditions - https://www.defeatdiabetes.com.au/terms-and-conditions/
